talkative: ^You really do a great job managing this cafe and I’m really happy getting to meet and talk to so many new humans every day.
^They seem to love listening to me talk but it seems like I can never find anyone that can keep up with the conversation!

s: ^"That’s surprising, I thought you just loved hearing your own voice."
^"That’s a shame, it’s always nice to find someone to have engaging talks with. I’ll try my best to keep my eye out for you!"

talkative_notnice: ^That wasn’t very nice to say. I wouldn’t like to have a conversation with someone like you.
talkative_nice: ^It would be my dream to spend my days engrossed in conversation with my human and appreciating each other’s input and company!!
